alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 1:55PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is likely. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...The river will likely oscillate between action stage and minor flooding for the next couple of days before likely dropping off some and staying in action stage. Any future peaks will be highly dependent on rainfall. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM MDT Saturday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around minor flood stage with a maximum value of 4.16 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.2 feet on 07/03/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 4.0 Sat 1 pm MDT 4.1 4.0 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
